title: The extended Frobenius problem for Fibonacci sequences incremented by a Fibonacci number. (arXiv:2210.00816v2 [math.NT] UPDATED)
description: We study the extended Frobenius problem for sequences of the form $\{f_a+f_n\}_{n\in\mathbb{N}}$, where $\{f_n\}_{n\in\mathbb{N}}$ is the Fibonacci sequence and $f_a$ is a Fibonacci number. As a consequence, we show that the family of numerical semigroups associated to these sequences satisfies the Wilf's conjecture.
dc:creator: Aureliano M. Robles-Pérez, José Carlos Rosales
